return.description: Returns a connection identifier or FALSE on error.

notes.description:
An incorrectly installed or configured OCI8 extension will often
    manifest itself as a connection problem or error.
    See Installing/Configuring for
    troubleshooting information.

In PHP versions before 5.0.0 use ocilogon
    instead. The old function name can still be used
in current versions, however it is deprecated and not recommended.
